ygData.subject: Re: SV: SV: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: I think in the very least Verant should provide guidelines on how to keep your computer secure and safe. I d even be willing to pay extra if they had their own
ygData.messageBody:
I think in the very least Verant should provide guidelines on how to keep
your computer secure and safe. I'd even be willing to pay extra if they had
their own virus/trojan checker. All the ones I try to dl don't work. Plus
tech support for eq often tell people to turn off their virus scanners and
firewalls while playing. They seem to expect the users to adjust their
systems to accept the changes made to EQ rather than adjusting EQ to work
with the users systems.
luv,
-Su

> Verant says it's YOUR responsibility to keep your account secure.. Well,
the
> re's not a damn thing in hell you can do if your dorm mate decides to run
a
> sniffer and there he'll be able to read your login name and password in
plai
> ntext.. But Verant still thinks that it's the players responsibility..
*sigh
> * braindead fools...
>
> -----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
